properties.areaDesc: Greeley; Wichita; Sherman; Cheyenne; Wallace; Kit Carson County
properties.headline: Red Flag Warning issued February 2 at 12:24AM MST until February 2 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland KS
properties.description:
...Critical fire weather conditions across portions of the
Tri-State area this afternoon...

* Affected Area...In Colorado...Fire Weather Zone 253 Kit Carson
and Fire Weather Zone 254 Cheyenne. In Kansas...Fire Weather
Zone 013 Sherman...Fire Weather Zone 027 Wallace...Fire
Weather Zone 041 Greeley and Fire Weather Zone 042 Wichita.

* Timing...11 AM MST (Noon CST) through 5 PM MST (6 PM CST).

* Winds...Southwest at 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph.

* Relative Humidity...As low as 5 to 15 percent.

* Temperatures...70 to 75 degrees.

* Impacts...Unpredictable fire behavior. Any fires that start may
rapidly grow and spread out of control.
properties.instruction:
Avoid outdoor burning. Repeating, outdoor burning is not advised.
Any fires that start may rapidly grow and spread out of control.

NWSheadline: RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MST /NOON CST/ THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 013...027...041... 042...253 AND 254
